name: VERTIGO (itch) (andracer108)
description:
VERTIGO is a small pet project that I undertook to teach myself how to manage my ambitions and keep with deadlines while still acting on my ideas and imagination. Unfortunately, due to the nature of such a project, I will rarely update it, if at all. However, feedback would still be appreciated on how this game can be improved!

Review

I will also be doing / have done a post-development review of my game project on my channel, where you can catch a glimpse of how I made this game by showing how I learned pixel art and what programming practices I used. Hope you'll check it out!
